Posts.Content: could somebody tell what a core (or maybe they said cone) biopsy is and what is it like? I went to the surgeon on family dr's orders & this is what he ordered. thnx
Posts.Title: core biopsy?

Posts.Content: thanks Julie. I am putting the cart before the horse because I still need the ultrasound tomorrow before any biopsy but I read before where someone on this site waited a long time for biopsy results-that would make me totally bonkers. Just so much runs thru your mind-I am supposed to leave for vacation w/ my husband on Tues for 2 wks & wonder how I will feel about that if they let me know anything from the ultrasound... I am so sorry to hear your biopsy results were positive but glad they downgraded it. Hearing from those going thru this is really wonderful-glad I found this site-makes you feel as though you are not alone and not totally nuts.
Posts.Title: core biopsy?

Posts.Content: thank you for your kindness-your replies help alot to calm me down
Posts.Title: core biopsy?

Posts.Content: anyone know how long on average it takes to get results?
Posts.Title: core biopsy?

Posts.Content: Just something I wanted to share-the female radiologist who examined me said it is possible to have breast changes similar to menstrual cycle/estrogen driven changes even though you no longer menstruate if you have lost weight. She said the estrogen, stored in the fat cells, is released upon weight loss.
Posts.Title: weight loss causes release of estrogen
